name: enhanced_rolling_priority_dispatch
algorithm:
1. Identify must-run and must-off units using min up/down times and shutdown ramp constraints
2. Sort available units by marginal cost at minimum output plus prorated startup cost
3. Commit must-run units first, then activate additional units in sorted order until load can be met
4. Perform economic dispatch using lambda iteration with ramp constraints
5. Fine-tune outputs using marginal cost ordering to exactly match load
